dict.acceptation: 呼吸；活着，生存；小憩一会儿，歇歇气；散发香气；
呼吸；吸进（如香气）；尤指平静地吐露，低语；使…明显的，暗示；

sent.orig: The doctor asked me to breathe in, then to breathe out fully.
sent.trans: 医生让我先吸气，然后全部呼出。

sent.orig: Let me listen to your lungs, deep breath, breathe in and breathe out.
sent.trans: 我来听听你的肺部，深呼吸，吸气，憋气，呼出。

sent.orig: Now breathe in -- hold it -- breathe out. Do it again.
sent.trans: 请吸气，屏住呼吸，呼气，再做一次。

sent.orig: Everybody please breathe in deeply and breathe out slowly.
sent.trans: 请大家深深地吸气，慢慢地呼气。

sent.orig: The doctor told me to breathe in deeply and breathe out slowly.
sent.trans: 医生告诉我先深吸一口气然后慢慢呼出来。
